nodes.bodyText: Do we need readCache() and deserializeFormDef() looks like the same code is duplicated in javarosa org.javarosa.benchmarks.utils.FormDefCache?

Yes, this is client code. The package you point to is for benchmarks and that code was copied from Collect. You're right that the duplication is weird and I wonder whether we should rework the benchmark a bit on the JR side. I don't think there are changes to make here for now, though.
Well, I don't know. Maybe some of it should move down to JR. Seems like a consideration for another time, though!
